OAObjectCSDelegate

public OAObjectCSDelegate()
Method Detail

isRemoteThread

public static boolean isRemoteThread()
Returns:
true if the current thread is from the OAClient.getMessage().

isServer

public static boolean isServer()
Used to determine if this JDK is running as an OAServer or OAClient.

Returns:
true if this is not a Client, either the Server or Stand alone

isWorkstation

public static boolean isWorkstation()
Used to determine if this JDK is running as an OAServer or OAClient.

Returns:
true if this is not a Client, either the Server or Stand alone

initialize

protected static void initialize(OAObject oaObj)
Called by OAObjectDelegate.initialize(). If Object is being created on workstation, then it needs to be cached on server, so that it wont be gc'd on server while it is still being used on client(s).

finalizeObject

protected static void finalizeObject(OAObject oaObj)

addToServerSideCache

public static void addToServerSideCache(OAObject oaObj)
If Object is not in a Hub, then it could be gc'd on server, while it still exists on a client(s). To keep the object from gc on server, each OAObjectServer maintains a cache to keep "unattached" objects from being gc'd.

removeFromServerSideCache

public static void removeFromServerSideCache(OAObject oaObj)
If Object is not in a Hub, then it could be gc'd on server, while it still exists on a client(s). To keep the object from gc on server, each OAObjectServer maintains a cache to keep "unattached" objects from being gc'd.

createNewObject

protected static java.lang.Object createNewObject(java.lang.Class clazz)
Create a new instance of an object. If OAClient.client exists, this will create the object on the server, where the server datasource can initialize object.

createCopy

protected static OAObject createCopy(OAObject oaObj,
                                     java.lang.String[] excludeProperties)
Create a new copy of an object. If OAClient.client exists, this will create the object on the server.

getServerGuid

protected static int getServerGuid()

save

protected static boolean save(OAObject oaObj,
                              int iCascadeRule)

delete

protected static boolean delete(OAObject oaObj)
Same as delete, without first calling canDelete.

Returns:
true if delete was sent to server, false if it was not sent.
See Also:
#delete()

removeObject

protected static boolean removeObject(OAObject oaObj)
Remove object from each workstation.

                                          OAObjectKey key)
